E

embark() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Transitions into an EMBARKING state
Used to enter the "pick route" screen at port
Embark - Class in gui
Represent being "at the port", choosing what island to sail to next.
Also displays information about every route (risks, cost, length...).

Note: The player CAN game-over here, if there's no way of them leaving the island (being unable to afford any route, or if there's not enough time to reach the destination)
Embark(GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class gui.Embark
Create the frame.
EMBARKING - main.GameState
 
enoughTimeForRoutes - Variable in class gui.Embark
 
environment - Static variable in class cli.CommandLine
 
environment - Variable in class gui.GameSetup
 
environment - Static variable in class gui.GUI
 
environment - Variable in class gui.OnIsland
 
environment - Variable in class gui.Sailing
 
environment - Variable in class gui.SaleScreen
 
environment - Variable in class gui.UpgradeSale
 
errorLbl - Variable in class gui.GameSetup
 
errorPanel - Variable in class gui.GameSetup
 
escape(String) - Method in class gui.GameOverScreen
 
ev_pirate(PirateAttack) - Static method in class cli.CommandLine
Pirate attacks are random events that occur while sailing.
The player must roll a D6
ev_rescue(Rescue) - Static method in class cli.CommandLine
Rescues are random events that occur while sailing.
You rescue x amount of sailors, who give a cash reward for saving them
ev_storm(Weather) - Static method in class cli.CommandLine
Storms are random events that occur while sailing.
They deal damage to your ship, which must be healed at the nearest island
events - package events
Contains all the random events
exceptions - package exceptions
Contains all the custom exception classes that other modules throw
